articles.title: Bavuma and beyond: Planning for the future after Proteas exceed expectation at World Cup
articles.description: When the dust settles on a heartening if ultimately deflating World Cup campaign, Enoch Nkwe, Cricket South Africa's (CSA) director of cricket, will have thorough sit-down with his so-called marquee players.

articles.title: Relive five great moments from the Cricket World Cup
articles.description: Relive five great moments from the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup, including Glenn Maxwell's double century, Virat Kohli's record and Angelo Matthews' controversial timed-out dismissal.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
